meanings.sent1: The cold and rainy weather was unwelcome during our picnic.
meanings.sent2: The unwelcome news of the test results dampened her spirits.
meanings.sent3: The unwelcome rain turned our outdoor party into an indoor gathering.
meanings.sent4: The unwelcome visitor overstayed their welcome, making everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: The unwelcome noise from the construction site disrupted our peaceful afternoon.

meanings.sent1: The unwelcome gift was quickly returned to the store.
meanings.sent2: The unwelcome chores piled up, causing frustration for the family.
meanings.sent3: The unwelcome smell from the kitchen made everyone lose their appetite.
meanings.sent4: The unwelcome attention from the stranger made her feel uneasy.
meanings.sent5: The unwelcome delay in the flight caused chaos at the airport.

meanings.sent1: The unwelcome guest showed up unannounced at the party.
meanings.sent2: The unwelcome phone call interrupted their family dinner.
meanings.sent3: The unwelcome email ended up in the spam folder, never to be seen.
meanings.sent4: The unwelcome noise from the neighbors' party kept them up all night.
meanings.sent5: The unwelcome changes to the schedule caused confusion among the team.
